scripts.copy-schema: fcli ensure static/schemas/plugin-package && fcli copy ../desktop/pkg/schemas/plugin-package-v2.json static/schemas/plugin-package/v2.json -o
scripts.start: yarn copy-schema && yarn generate-plugin-docs && yarn build:style-guide && docusaurus start --port 3001
scripts.build: yarn copy-schema && yarn generate-plugin-docs && yarn build:style-guide && docusaurus build
scripts.build:style-guide: fcli remove flipper-themes && fcli copy ../desktop/themes flipper-themes && lessc --js flipper-themes/light.less static/css/style-guide.css
